issue.title: ignition-gazebo major version is hard-coded in plugin filenames in sdf files

content.raw: +1 for avoiding version numbers in plugin file names. I think this would work even if the behavior changes between major versions because the search path of the plugins is set by the ign-gazebo running the sdf file. I don't expect users to mix plugins from different major versions.
